text: Andrew Poysell "Andy" Ireland (August 23, 1930 - October 20, 2024) was an American politician. He was a U.S. Representative from Florida serving from 1977 to 1993. Ireland died in Sarasota, Florida, on October 20, 2024, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * *The Washington Post Members of Congress / Andy Ireland Category:1930 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Politicians from Cincinnati Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Andy Ireland
